name: SnakeLoops
description:
Description

In SnakeLoops, you control a snake who’s only purpose is to see that beautiful confetti at the top of the tower. Wrap and loop yourself around the level so you can safely climb to the finish!

There are only 3 levels since this game might be a bit challenging for some.

Controls

(Best with Gamepad)

Gamepad:

Lift Head - A Button

Move - Left Stick

Camera - Right Stick

Keyboard Mouse Controls:

Lift Head - Left Mouse Button

Move - WASD

Camera - Moves with mouse

Quit Game - ESC

Tips:
  • If you struggle moving try to loop around objects more often.
  • Remember you can lift your head with Left Mouse on keyboard or “A” button on gamepad!
